questions.question: How do I sign in?
questions.answer: Click on the 'Login' tab on the homepage and enter your credentials to sign in.

questions.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

questions.question: What should I do if I encounter a failure message?
questions.answer: If you encounter a failure message, please contact support with the details of the issue.

questions.question: How do I manage user accounts?
questions.answer: As an admin, you can manage user accounts through the admin dashboard. You can create, edit, or delete user accounts.

questions.question: How do I view user analytics?
questions.answer: User analytics can be accessed from the admin dashboard under the 'Analytics' section.

questions.question: How do I add a watermark or license to a document?
questions.answer: Admins can add watermarks or licenses to documents through the document management section in the admin dashboard.

questions.question: How do I moderate documents?
questions.answer: Moderators can review and approve or reject documents through the moderation panel available in their dashboard.

questions.question: How do I rate a document?
questions.answer: You can rate a document by clicking on the rating stars available on the document's page.

questions.question: How do I view analytics?
questions.answer: Moderators can view analytics related to document views and user engagement through the analytics section in their dashboard.

questions.question: How do I contribute documents?
questions.answer: Educators can contribute documents by uploading them through the 'Contribute Documents' page and tagging them appropriately.

questions.question: Can I edit my contributed documents?
questions.answer: Yes, you can edit your contributed documents by accessing them through your profile and making the necessary changes.

questions.question: How do I rate a document?
questions.answer: You can rate a document by clicking on the rating stars available on the document's page.

questions.question: How do I search for documents?
questions.answer: You can search for documents using the search bar on the homepage. Enter keywords related to the document you are looking for.

questions.question: Can I rate documents?
questions.answer: Yes, open access users can rate documents by clicking on the rating stars available on the document's page.

questions.question: What types of files can I upload?
questions.answer: You can upload only PDFs and Word documents. Ensure they meet the platform's guidelines.

questions.question: How do I tag my documents?
questions.answer: When uploading a document, you will be prompted to add tags. Tags help categorize and make your document searchable.

questions.question: Where are my files stored?
questions.answer: All files are securely stored on our servers and can be accessed anytime through your profile.

questions.question: Is there a limit to the number of files I can store?
questions.answer: There is no limit to the number of files you can store, but each file must adhere to the size limits specified in the upload guidelines.

questions.question: How do I use advanced search options?
questions.answer: Advanced search options are available under the search bar. You can filter results by subject, grade, and other criteria.

questions.question: What should I do if I can't find a document?
questions.answer: If you can't find a document, try using different keywords or check the spelling. You can also contact support for assistance.

questions.question: What kind of analytics can I view?
questions.answer: You can view analytics related to document views, downloads, user engagement, and more.

questions.question: How often are analytics updated?
questions.answer: Analytics are updated in real-time and can be accessed anytime through the analytics dashboard.
